info.title: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Client
info.description: Rest API for Azure Red Hat OpenShift 4

get.summary: Lists all of the available RP operations.
get.description: The operation returns the RP operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Lists all OpenShift versions available to install in the specified location.
get.description: The operation returns the installable OpenShift versions as strings.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Lists OpenShift clusters in the specified subscription.
get.description: The operation returns properties of each OpenShift cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Lists MachinePools that belong to that Azure Red Hat OpenShift Cluster.
get.description: The operation returns properties of each MachinePool.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

APIServerProfile.description: APIServerProfile represents an API server profile.

url.description: The URL to access the cluster API server.

ip.description: The IP of the cluster API server.

error.description: An error response from the service.

CloudErrorBody.description: CloudErrorBody represents the body of a cloud error.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

pullSecret.description: The pull secret for the cluster.

resourceGroupId.description: The ID of the cluster resource group.

fipsValidatedModules.description: If FIPS validated crypto modules are used

url.description: The URL to access the cluster console.

Display.description: Display represents the display details of an operation.

provider.description: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.description: Resource type on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Operation type: read, write, delete, listKeys/action, etc.

EffectiveOutboundIP.description: EffectiveOutboundIP represents an effective outbound IP resource of the cluster public load balancer.

id.description: The fully qualified Azure resource id of an IP address resource.

EncryptionAtHost.description: EncryptionAtHost represents encryption at host state

FipsValidatedModules.description: FipsValidatedModules determines if FIPS is used.

LoadBalancerProfile.description: LoadBalancerProfile represents the profile of the cluster public load balancer.

managedOutboundIps.description: The desired managed outbound IPs for the cluster public load balancer.

effectiveOutboundIps.description: The list of effective outbound IP addresses of the public load balancer.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

MachinePoolList.description: MachinePoolList represents a list of MachinePools

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

MachinePoolProperties.description: MachinePoolProperties represents the properties of a MachinePool

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

ManagedOutboundIPs.description: ManagedOutboundIPs represents the desired managed outbound IPs for the cluster public load balancer.

count.description: Count represents the desired number of IPv4 outbound IPs created and managed by Azure for the cluster public load balancer.  Allowed values are in the range of 1 - 20.  The default value is 1.

vmSize.description: The size of the master VMs.

subnetId.description: The Azure resource ID of the master subnet.

encryptionAtHost.description: Whether master virtual machines are encrypted at host.

diskEncryptionSetId.description: The resource ID of an associated DiskEncryptionSet, if applicable.

podCidr.description: The CIDR used for OpenShift/Kubernetes Pods.

serviceCidr.description: The CIDR used for OpenShift/Kubernetes Services.

outboundType.description: The OutboundType used for egress traffic.

preconfiguredNSG.description: Specifies whether subnets are pre-attached with an NSG

OpenShiftCluster.description: OpenShiftCluster represents an Azure Red Hat OpenShift cluster.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

OpenShiftClusterAdminKubeconfig.description: OpenShiftClusterAdminKubeconfig represents an OpenShift cluster's admin kubeconfig.

OpenShiftClusterCredentials.description: OpenShiftClusterCredentials represents an OpenShift cluster's credentials.

kubeadminUsername.description: The username for the kubeadmin user.

kubeadminPassword.description: The password for the kubeadmin user.

OpenShiftClusterList.description: OpenShiftClusterList represents a list of OpenShift clusters.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

OpenShiftClusterProperties.description: OpenShiftClusterProperties represents an OpenShift cluster's properties.

OpenShiftClusterUpdate.description: OpenShiftCluster represents an Azure Red Hat OpenShift cluster.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

OpenShiftVersion.description: OpenShiftVersion represents an OpenShift version that can be installed.

properties.description: The properties for the OpenShiftVersion resource.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

OpenShiftVersionList.description: OpenShiftVersionList represents a List of available versions.

OpenShiftVersionProperties.description: OpenShiftVersionProperties represents the properties of an OpenShiftVersion.

version.description: Version represents the version to create the cluster at.

display.description: The object that describes the operation.

origin.description: Sources of requests to this operation.  Comma separated list with valid values user or system, e.g. "user,system".

OperationList.description: OperationList represents an RP operation list.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

OutboundType.description: The outbound routing strategy used to provide your cluster egress to the internet.

PreconfiguredNSG.description: PreconfiguredNSG represents whether customers want to use their own NSG attached to the subnets

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

SecretList.description: SecretList represents a list of Secrets

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

SecretProperties.description: SecretProperties represents the properties of a Secret

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

ServicePrincipalProfile.description: ServicePrincipalProfile represents a service principal profile.

clientId.description: The client ID used for the cluster.

clientSecret.description: The client secret used for the cluster.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

SyncIdentityProviderList.description: SyncSetList represents a list of SyncSets

value.description: The list of sync identity providers

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

SyncIdentityProviderProperties.description: SyncSetProperties represents the properties of a SyncSet

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

SyncSet.description: SyncSet represents a SyncSet for an Azure Red Hat OpenShift Cluster.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

SyncSetList.description: SyncSetList represents a list of SyncSets

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

SyncSetProperties.description: SyncSetProperties represents the properties of a SyncSet

SyncSetUpdate.description: SyncSet represents a SyncSet for an Azure Red Hat OpenShift Cluster.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

Tags.description: Tags represents an OpenShift cluster's tags.

VMSize.description:
VM size availability varies by region.
If a node contains insufficient compute resources (memory, cpu, etc.), pods might fail to run correctly.
For more details on restricted VM sizes, see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/openshift/support-policies-v4#supported-virtual-machine-sizes

vmSize.description: The size of the worker VMs.

diskSizeGB.description: The disk size of the worker VMs.

subnetId.description: The Azure resource ID of the worker subnet.

encryptionAtHost.description: Whether master virtual machines are encrypted at host.

diskEncryptionSetId.description: The resource ID of an associated DiskEncryptionSet, if applicable.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: The version of the API the caller wants to use.
